text: I'm sure there are annoyed Lions fans out there but I'm not one of them. 2 points is better than 0 and I honestly think we're lucky to even get the 2 this week. North played better than us. Also it now seems to be an annual tradition for the Lions to get a draw on Mother's Day

~35 years ago they started showing the occasional AFL game in Canada and i immediately loved it. Then ~20 years ago, I started working in Australia. I was in Adelaide and watched the Crows vs Essendon. The Crows became my team. Been there a few times. Watched games in Adelaide and Brisbane. Fave sport.
